research_topic: AI in Education: Comprehensive Deep Research (2024-2026)

key_conclusions.effectiveness_verdict: AI demonstrates significant positive effects on learning (g=0.86), with ITS matching human tutoring effectiveness (d=0.80)
key_conclusions.genai_verdict: Transformative but requires intentional pedagogical integration to preserve critical thinking
key_conclusions.analytics_verdict: Learning analytics achieve 85-95% accuracy in dropout prediction, enabling proactive interventions
key_conclusions.ethics_verdict: Urgent attention needed for algorithmic bias, data privacy, and regulatory gaps
key_conclusions.future_outlook: AI will become integral to education; success depends on human-AI co-participation, not substitution
